languages.text: "Мы — торговцы, а не воины. Языку битв мы предпочитаем язык сделок. Но это не значит, что нас можно запугать. Наша организация действует в тенях, и мы привыкли к сопротивлению сильным мира сего. Не советую узнавать, сколь остры клинки, кои мы предпочитаем прятать в ножнах — сие знание может стать ядом для разума".

"We are traders, not fighters — we prefer the language of deals over the language of battles. But that does not mean we can be intimidated. Our organisation operates in the shadows, and we are used to opposition from the powers that be. We keep our blades sheathed, but give us cause to show you how sharp they truly are, and you will sorely regret it. Such knowledge is enough to poison the mind."
languages.original_text: "Мы — торговцы, а не воины. Языку битв мы предпочитаем язык сделок. Но это не значит, что нас можно запугать. Наша организация действует в тенях, и мы привыкли к сопротивлению сильным мира сего. Не советую узнавать, сколь остры клинки, кои мы предпочитаем прятать в ножнах — сие знание может стать ядом для разума".

Our organisation operates in the shadows, and we are used to opposition from the powers that be. We keep our blades sheathed, but give us cause to show you how sharp they truly are, and you will sorely regret it. Such knowledge is enough to poison the mind."

Our organisation operates in the shadows, and we are used to opposition from the powers that be. We keep our blades sheathed, but give us cause to show you how sharp they truly are, and you will sorely regret it. Such knowledge is enough to poison the mind."

We keep our blades sheathed, but give us cause to show you how sharp they truly are, and you will sorely regret it. Such knowledge is enough to poison the mind."

languages.text: “我们是商人，不是战士。我们更喜欢贸易的语言，而非战斗的语言。不过，这并不意味着别人可以吓倒我们。我们的组织在暗中运转，也已经习惯了当权者的镇压。我们的利刃从不出鞘，但如果您打算看看我们的利刃有多么锋利，您一定会后悔。有些事情，还是不知为好。”
languages.original_text: "We are traders, not fighters — we prefer the language of deals over the language of battles. But that does not mean we can be intimidated. Our organisation operates in the shadows, and we are used to opposition from the powers that be. We keep our blades sheathed, but give us cause to show you how sharp they truly are, and you will sorely regret it. Such knowledge is enough to poison the mind."

traits.locale_text: “我们是商人，不是战士。我们更喜欢贸易的语言，而非战斗的语言。不过，这并不意味着别人可以吓倒我们。我们的组织在暗中运转，也已经习惯了当权者的镇压。我们的利刃从不出鞘，但如果您打算看看我们的利刃有多么锋利，您一定会后悔。有些事情，还是不知为好。”

languages.text: 「我々は貿易商であり、戦争屋ではないのです。我々はは戦いの言葉よりも取引の言葉を好みます。しかし、だからといって我々を脅せるなどとは思わないことです。我々の組織は影で動いており、権力者からの反発には慣れている。我々は刃を鞘に納めてはいますが、その切れ味を見れば、ひどく後悔することになるでしょう。知れば、心を蝕むのには十分なほどに」
languages.original_text: "We are traders, not fighters — we prefer the language of deals over the language of battles. But that does not mean we can be intimidated. Our organisation operates in the shadows, and we are used to opposition from the powers that be. We keep our blades sheathed, but give us cause to show you how sharp they truly are, and you will sorely regret it. Such knowledge is enough to poison the mind."

traits.locale_text: 「我々は貿易商であり、戦争屋ではないのです。我々はは戦いの言葉よりも取引の言葉を好みます。しかし、だからといって我々を脅せるなどとは思わないことです。我々の組織は影で動いており、権力者からの反発には慣れている。我々は刃を鞘に納めてはいますが、その切れ味を見れば、ひどく後悔することになるでしょう。知れば、心を蝕むのには十分なほどに」

languages.text: «Somos comerciantes, no luchadores. Preferimos el idioma de los negocios al de las batidas. Pero eso no quiere decir que se nos pueda intimidar; nuestra organización opera desde las sombras y está acostumbrada a que se nos oponga la autoridad de turno. El filo de nuestras hojas permanece oculto, pero quien provoca que se desenvainen acaba lamentándolo. Tal información es suficiente para envenenar la mente».
languages.original_text: "We are traders, not fighters — we prefer the language of deals over the language of battles. But that does not mean we can be intimidated. Our organisation operates in the shadows, and we are used to opposition from the powers that be. We keep our blades sheathed, but give us cause to show you how sharp they truly are, and you will sorely regret it. Such knowledge is enough to poison the mind."

traits.locale_text: «Somos comerciantes, no luchadores. Preferimos el idioma de los negocios al de las batidas. Pero eso no quiere decir que se nos pueda intimidar; nuestra organización opera desde las sombras y está acostumbrada a que se nos oponga la autoridad de turno. El filo de nuestras hojas permanece oculto, pero quien provoca que se desenvainen acaba lamentándolo. Tal información es suficiente para envenenar la mente».

languages.text: « Nous sommes des marchands, pas des guerriers ; nous préférons la langue des affaires à celle des batailles, mais ça ne veut pas dire que nous nous laissons intimider. Notre organisation opère dans les ombres et nous avons l'habitude d'aller à l'encontre des puissants. Nous gardons nos lames dans leurs fourreaux, mais si vous nous donnez une bonne raison de les dégainer, vous verrez à quel point elles sont tranchantes. Je vous déconseille vivement d'en arriver là. »
languages.original_text: "We are traders, not fighters — we prefer the language of deals over the language of battles. But that does not mean we can be intimidated. Our organisation operates in the shadows, and we are used to opposition from the powers that be. We keep our blades sheathed, but give us cause to show you how sharp they truly are, and you will sorely regret it. Such knowledge is enough to poison the mind."

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes des marchands, pas des guerriers ; nous préférons la langue des affaires à celle des batailles, mais ça ne veut pas dire que nous nous laissons intimider. Notre organisation opère dans les ombres et nous avons l'habitude d'aller à l'encontre des puissants. Nous gardons nos lames dans leurs fourreaux, mais si vous nous donnez une bonne raison de les dégainer, vous verrez à quel point elles sont tranchantes. Je vous déconseille vivement d'en arriver là. »

languages.text: "Wir sind Händler, keine Kämpfer – wir ziehen es vor, Geschäfte statt Kämpfe sprechen zu lassen. Das bedeutet aber nicht, dass wir uns einschüchtern lassen. Unsere Organisation arbeitet im Schatten und wir sind es gewöhnt, das uns die Machthabenden Widerstand leisten. Unsere Klingen bleiben in ihren Scheiden, aber wenn Ihr uns einen Grund liefert, sie zu ziehen, dann werdet Ihr das noch bitter bereuen. Das zu wissen reicht schon aus, um den Verstand zu vergiften."
languages.original_text: "We are traders, not fighters — we prefer the language of deals over the language of battles. But that does not mean we can be intimidated. Our organisation operates in the shadows, and we are used to opposition from the powers that be. We keep our blades sheathed, but give us cause to show you how sharp they truly are, and you will sorely regret it. Such knowledge is enough to poison the mind."

languages.text: "Bizler taciriz, savaşçı değil. Savaşın dilinden konuşmaktansa, anlaşmaların dilinden konuşmayı yeğleriz. Ama bu demek değil ki gözümüz korkutulabilir. Organizasyonumuz gölgelerde faaliyet gösterir ve gücü elinde bulunduranların karşısında olmaya alışığız. Kılıçlarımızı kınında tutarız ama bize onların ne kadar keskin olduğunu göstermemiz için bir sebep veren pişman olur. Böylesi bir bilgi, zihni zehirlemek için yeterlidir."
languages.original_text: "We are traders, not fighters — we prefer the language of deals over the language of battles. But that does not mean we can be intimidated. Our organisation operates in the shadows, and we are used to opposition from the powers that be. We keep our blades sheathed, but give us cause to show you how sharp they truly are, and you will sorely regret it. Such knowledge is enough to poison the mind."
